Replies.Reply: "Come, ye children, listen to me.   I will teach you the fear of the LORD."

reflected in a greasy puddle of water. Might just be the smog that's making it that ominous color. Then we notice something moving in the reflection. A dark shape, growing, coming down at us fast. Beat...then WHAM!
Goddamn' animals. Nights like this I wish I could take a match to this city just so I could watch all these motherfuckers burn.
A fresh start. That's what this place needs.
Shut the fuck up and drop the bags now!
Turn around! Turn the fuck around!
Suddenly Burton starts to SHAKE, the words stuck in his throat like a skipping record.
What are you doing, Michael?   These weren't your orders.
Then you will die along with the child.
A good ol' boy barbecue, huh?
Jesus... You know Burton, I'm so happy we get to share beautiful moments like this. They really brighten my da--
Drop the bags! Hands on your head!
Hands on your head!    On your head!
Burton, you fuckin' know this guy?!
It's starting. There isn't much time.
I'm following my own orders now.
Charlie freezes a few feet from the car when she sees those piercing eyes already familiar to us. Michael looks at her, as if she was exactly who he expected to see.
That how you greet all your customers?
He can handle it. He doesn't have a choice.
If you want to live, you'll do exactly as I say.
When you fire, you keep your thumb off the slide. Don't hesitate.
Alright. There's a safety switch on the side of your gun. Push it all the way down. Two clicks.
Now when this starts, you hold on tight, you hear me? If you don't, you're going to blow your hand off.
Spread out! Don't let them get close to the windows!
I told you not to do anything brave.
Someone needs to be on the roof.
The first time God lost faith in Man he sent a flood. The second time...he sent what you see outside.
I'm saying this is an extermination.
Those things out there are vessels.
That's where your book is wrong.
I know because until last night, I was on their side.
That's fine, because He doesn't believe in you either.
Because your child is the only hope humanity has of surviving.
If you want to live you'll do what I say. This first attack was a test of our strength. The next one will be a test of our weakness.
Something much worse is on its way.
We'll keep watch on the roof in shifts of two. Jeep, go get some tools. We need to close up this window before somebody else goes out.
I was a soldier, a general, in His army.
I was given an order I didn't believe in...
Sometimes we have to face the thing we fear the most in order to be free of it.
It's almost time for the next shift.
We can't risk being on the move when the child comes. It's too dangerous.
Don't. You open that door and we could all be dead.
He's coming. We have to hurry.
Charlie, I need you to push. I need you to push as hard as you can.
Take him... Give her a minute.
No. Killing the child would have ended the war before it had begun.
You'll need to teach him how.
Each of us has a burden. This one is yours and yours alone. Maybe someday you'll understand what that means.
The Possessed can't come near the child, so He sent someone that can.
Gabriel. My lieutenant.      He's come to do what I wouldn't.
There was never meant to be a Second Coming. But we've just changed that. The child lives.
No, Jeep! You must protect the child now!
My path ends here. You are the true protector. You always have been.
Find the Prophets.   Learn to read the instructions.
I knew he'd send you, Gabriel. You were always so eager to please Him.
To not feel their burden...is a dream.
The child lives. What happens to me doesn't matter now.
Join with me. You don't need do this. There's another way.
Wasn't you. He's been kickin' up a storm all night. Must know somethin' I don't.
Replies.Didascalie: (stepping out of the trailer, hands on her  BELLY)

Replies.Reply: It's just stress, Jeep, that's all.
See what I mean? You're worried about a girl eight months pregnant and it isn't even your baby. Now that's enough to give anybody nightmares.

C'mon, I was only kiddin'. You know how much I appreciate everything you and Bob are doing for me, but a month from now, this baby'll have a new family and I'll have to start thinkin' about what the hell I'm doin' with my life.
Jeep, I'm not ready to be a mama.
You gotta stop carryin' the weight of the world on your shoulders.
Now can we go back in? I'm freezing my ass off out here.
You can buy a whole pack inside.
Yeah, we got a buttermilk stack for three seventy-five. We also got french toast for four dollars if you're into that. I personally like the pancakes though.
Yeah, I'm okay. This guy's just lost.
Percy's right. I didn't feel nothing.
Have a seat wherever you want, Ma'am. Specials are on the board.
And how'd you like that cooked?
So they say. I'll be right back with your water.
Out of sight. Out of mind.
No, I prefer it that way. I don't a need a man tellin' me what to do.
Oh god, please don't throw up.
We don't know anything. Nothing's working here. The TV, the radio, the phone...
Michael's eyes flit momentarily in Charlie's direction.
He brings them here and then he saves us from them? You're a genius, Bob.
Look, this is not possible! I'm just a waitress! I'm nobody! I can't give birth to the Savior of Mankind!
I don't even own a car!
That can't be. I'm only eight months pregnant.
That can't be more than an hour up the highway from here.
You mean besides the fact that I just found out that I'm the mother of the Messiah?
Crazy thing is...I didn't want this baby. I even went down to the clinic, you know that?
How come you have so much faith in me, Jeep? God knows I've never given you or anybody else a reason to. Or is it that you just can't find any other hard-luck case to follow around?
Bob springs into action.   Pushes the booth away from the front door.
Do you have no heart?!     She's just a kid!
I swear if you don't do something, I will!
So are we safe now?   Is it over?
What makes you think I can do that?
Michael, what the hell's he talking about?!
Is this what I think it is?
She saved us, Jeep. Audrey saved us. Now c'mon, we gotta go!
How can this happen in a world so beautiful?
Stop it!   I'LL GIVE YOU THE BABY!
What if we're on our own now?
You're the only thing I like worrying about.
Go ahead, make fun of me.
So you're still going through with it...?
I could help you. We could do it together, you know? I want to.
Go on.   I'll be right there.
Found it under a bunch of stuff in the storage shed. I know you never like to throw anything away...
Don't say that about her!     She's not like that!
Look, I know it doesn't make any sense to you, but it's just something I have to do.
C'mon Dad. You can't blame yourself for what she did--
The carburetor's shot.    Don't know why. Looks brand new.
I could try to rebuild it, but it'd take a while, and I don't think we have all the parts. If we call right now, we might be able to get a new one down here tomorrow morning.
I couldn't pull the trigger. I froze. I saw what I needed to do, but I was afraid...
Or Charlie...She would've killed me if it wasn't for...
They go around to the BACK OF THE CAR.   Jeep slips the key in.
Wait a minute. Check it out. It's LAPD. What's an LA cop doing way out here?
But Bob can't even speak, he's so scared.   He squeezes his eyes closed.
I said, I can handle it!
You're sayin' she's the mother of the Messiah?
What did you do...you know, before you came here...?
Well, what changed?   What made you leave?
So what happens to you...after this is over?
We should get back out there...
Guess it's your turn not to sleep.
You shouldn't say things like that, Charlie. It isn't right. You'll get through this. I know you will.
You know, you're not the only who's suffered, okay? Let me know when you stop feeling sorry for yourself.
She's never said. I just assumed it was Joe Danvers. You know how she's always had a thing for bad boys.
I thought you said I should move on?
We're not gonna make it outta here, are we?
You were the one who was supposed to kill the baby? That was the order you didn't obey.
But I don't know what to do!
We have no choice!    We have to get to Red Rock!
Okay, we need to figure out our weapon situation.   Hopefully Michael didn't take everything out of the car.
Yes. Now just put it down...
Okay. Okay. Handgun. Shotgun. A a flare gun... And a grenade.
Better not hold him too long.
Nothin' to be sorry about. It's true. I did follow you around. At least now I know there was a good reason.
Okay, all we gotta do is --
I'm sure they're just over the next ridge.
Don't be afraid.    We'll be okay.
I don't know whether I like it very much being seen around with an angel without any wings.
Lord as my witness, Bob, one of these days that thing's gonna hit you back.
Yeah, they got names for that kind a relationship.
I told you to get the satellite TV.
Nice work, Bob. What the hell's that?
Lot a folks could be hurt.
There ain't no radiation comin' from those things. Plus that don't explain the radio being out too.
Now, son, I'm sure you don't wanna go spillin' blood for no good reason in front of all these decent people, do ya? Our friend Bob here ain't worth the trouble it'd cause ya.
You ladies best get back inside.
The fuck y'all lookin' at me for?
You sayin' this is the Apocalypse...?
Son, I don't know what bible you been readin', but in my version, the angels are the good guys.
C'mon, Bob. Have you looked outside recently? Those aren't exactly our regular customers out there.
Navy, two tours. But the second one didn't work out so well, so I didn't get to go back for a third.
Your piece. The one you killed grandma with. Don't reckon it's for huntin' buck.
So it's a work thing, is it?
This business of yours... You like it?

When I was a kid my father would sit by my bed every night before I'd go to sleep and he'd say to me, Percy, if you don't wake up tomorrow, if it turns out that today was your last day on earth, would you be proud of what you've done in this life? Cuz if you ain't, then you better start gettin' square.
Whaddya talkin' about, Percy? We got a special relationship here.
This ain't a resort you know.    I got orders stacking up here.
You best not be smokin' again.    Not in your condition.
Replies.Didascalie: (sees the two cigarettes Kyle's handing her)

Replies.Reply: What?   I quit two years ago.
It was a gift from my ex-wife, alright? I'm sentimental. I don't wanna forget how much I hate her guts.
Goddamn it. Where the hell is Jeep?
The fact that this truck's hood's up mean anything to you?
Whaddya workin' on that's so goddamn important you're not doin' your job?
Jeep, I like Charlie. I do. And I think it's real good of you to lend her a helping hand, but she is not your responsibility.
Don't walk away from me while I'm talkin' to you!
How long you gonna follow her around like a puppy dog? Cleanin' up the messes she makes while she steps out with every guy around here other than you?!
You really think she's gonna stick around here after that baby's born and off her hands?

See that up there? Your mother thought I was crazy for wanting to buy this place, middle of nowhere...But I just knew this was what I was supposed to do. Told your mom, "just wait." Told her when they finally ran the freeway through here like they were plannin' on, this place would be like Grand Central Station.
Replies.Didascalie: (points up at the PARADISE FALLS sign)

Replies.Reply: But I was wrong. The freeway never came and now the only people who ever stop here are the ones who are lost.
And your mom? Well she got tired of waitin'.
Yeah, I can. And I'm sayin' you're about to make the same damn mistake I made, believing in something that's never gonna happen...Or someone.
It's time for you to move on from this place, Jeep. I don't wanna see you wake up one morning old and pissed off, realizing you're lost just like everybody else who stops here.
Now get to work on that truck. I wanna have these people on the road by nightfall.
What the hell do I need that crap for?
I got all the history I can take.
You know this was the top-of-the-
Okay, baby, this is gonna do it.
It's just one of those test things.
In the back past the kitchen.   Make it fast.
Hey, Percy, give that old radio of yours a shot. Maybe they got some news about the TV.
Not if it was centered in the desert.
Well, for cryin' out loud. There's no use in speculating. I'll just call my brother up in Needles. He must a heard something.
Relax, Mrs. Anderson. Nothing to get excited about. Probably just working on the lines.
Sides, I'm sure Jeep'll have your truck fixed up quick as can be, and then you'll be on your way.
Ah, shit. They're gonna be pissed.
That's not gonna happen.    Goddamn phone's out.
The fuck was that?!   What the fuck was that!?
There's nothin' to be ashamed of, Jeep.
Not everybody can play the hero.
The hell you need that for?!
She's cold as a freakin' ice cube.
I don't get it.    Why don't they come closer?
Careful. Old lady could have some kind of rabid poodle locked up in there.
Least now we know where that smell was coming from.
Take one step closer and I'll drop you right here.
Mister, after what we've been through here today, you're lucky we didn't shoot you first and greet you later. Now let me see your teeth.
Michael offers up a dangerous smile, revealing a not so well kept but definitely normal set of teeth. Bob and the others ease slightly.
Okay... Suppose you tell us your name then.
So what are you doin' out here?
Now, I don't care if this is the second coming of Jesus fucking Christ, I say it's time for you to either get talkin' or get the hell outta here!
Wait. I don't think that's such a good idea.
Alright, Rambo. You got us up here. Now you mind explaining what the fuck we're fighting?
Right and yesterday I was the fuckin' Easter Bunny. You know, fuck this. I don't even believe in God.
How do we know he didn't bring them here himself?
Wait a minute, isn't Mary supposed to be a vi--
Well I figure just cuz the world's coming to an end, it doesn't mean a man's gotta starve. All I can say is thank heavens they left the gas on.
Just gimme another minute with him, okay?
What the hell are you talkin' about? This is our chance!
Jesus Christ, what the hell is that boy doin'!
What a way to bring a child into the world.
She ever tell you his name?
Jeep, sooner or later she'll realize you're the best thing that's ever happened to her.
Can't a father be wrong sometimes?
I'm sorry Jeep. This shouldn't be happening to you...
Leave me, Jeep.     My place is here, remember?
Really, how can she go out in public wearing that?
I'm being punished for something, I know it.
If there's a real emergency aren't they supposed to give us some information about what to do?
So then why's the TV out?
Nice to meet you, Gladys. I'm Sandra and this is my husband Howard.
Say, Gladys, it seems the lines are down around here. The phone and TV, you know?
And I just was wondering if you might have heard something on your way up? You know, about what's going on?
Gladys, please. There's no reason to --
Howard, it's okay!     Don't listen to her!
What is it? What's happening? Who is this man? Why's he driving a police car?
How come you know so much about them?
How are we supposed to survive here for a month?
Couldn't eat if my life depended on it.
Stay away from me!    Don't come any closer!
You heard what he said. They just want the baby. Maybe if we just give it to them, then they'll let us go!
Why?! You never wanted him in the first place!
It's just one baby.   Just one.
I don't know. Why don't we just ask her?
Audrey, honey? Your mother was wondering if you got dressed this morning with the specific intention of showing your ass off to the entire world?
I feel satisfied with that answer.
Any news about when our truck might be fixed? You said your boy would have us on the road two hours ago.
They keep sayin' we're overdue for a big one.
Exactly.    Could be nothing to worry about.
Maybe it just hit the relay stations. Aren't those usually in remote areas?
Who the hell do you think you are, lady?! Now, I'd like you to apologize to my --
Oh, honey, listen.    It's the Ice Cream Man.
Yeah, that's cuz I woke up hoping to get double teamed by a couple of meth head truckers in the bathroom of some desert shithole.
Maybe it's a terrorist attack or something...?
So you're here to protect us?
Hey! You guys, I think I got something here!
Does that mean we can leave?
Yeah, I got it. All the way down.
Dated this guy last summer. A marine. Had a thing for guns.
My parents hate everything I do.
automatically know how to do this!
Yeah, but, how do you know how to do this?!
Oh my god...we did it!    Charlie, you did it!
Okay, all I got is a flare gun thing. Looks like we got a box of flares to go with it.
I can't believe it.   Is it really over...?
Get off her, you fucking asshole!
Do it, Jeep! Do it now!
Darren, your fuckin' directions suck, man.
You know that shit right there ain't good for the baby.
Now hold on, girl, let me bum one before you do.
Tell ya what. You let me have one of yours, and I'll give you two from the new pack you're gonna sell me.
Am I in the right place?
Sonuvabitch. There another phone around here? You know, one that works?
I can handle that.   You got pancakes here?
Can I use your phone? My cell doesn't get a signal out here and the pay phone outside is busted.
Yo, am I the Invisible motherfuckin' Man here?    Do you have a phone or not?
Is that my little man...? Yeah, well I'm working hard, so that I can be with you. You bein' good?
Phone's dead. Just tried to make a call.
Press your hands over the hole!
Don't look at me like that, lady!
They're fuckin' clouds!   What the fuck do they look like?
Well, I don't care how long she's been dead, the bitch ain't stayin' in here with us.
How the fuck am I supposed to know, man? You askin' me to explain the behavior of a motherfuckin' pestilence.
No Twilight Zone shit if that's what you mean.
Agh!   What the fuck is that?
Bitch's got motherfuckin' dead cats in her hoopty! What the fuck is wrong with white people?!
Yeah, it was a real motherfuckin' necessity we figured that out, man.
Now that we're locked in here, what the fuck are we supposed to do?
Where the hell did they go?
You've got to be fuckin' kidding me.
Ah, he don't look that bad.
Oh, shit.     Oh, shit.   Oh, shit.
Kyle turns happily to Michael.     Gone.   Kyle looks around the roof with alarm.
Then Kyle notices the broken window, takes in the room, his excitement falling.
So what, we're supposed to just hold those things off until Mary over there squeezes one out?
Oh we're fucked.     We are so fucked!
What was it like?    Being in a war?
No. I uh -- keep it for protection.
Yeah, people who might try to give me a hard time, you know?
Yeah, well, no, not regular, regular people.
I'm talkin' people whose job it is to give other people a hard time.
Who the fuck are you to be sweatin' me, man? I got my reasons for doin' what I do.
The only time my old man ever paid attention to me was when I was doing somethin' bad. So you know what I did?
I got really good at being bad.
It's a trap. They saw them coming and turned on the lights. It's a fucking trap!
A cloth wipes away the dirt, revealing the partial image of an ANGEL carved into the surface.
Oh, I already know what I want.
Rare if you would. And water, no ice.
What an unusual name for a girl.
What a nice young couple you are.
Oh, don't worry yourself about that, sweetheart. It'll all be over soon.
Thank you, dear. How far along are you?
The father must be very proud.
Oh, I see.     So you're not married, I take it?
I said your fucking baby's gonna burn.
All those babies.    They're gonna burn.
Shut up, you stupid fucking cunt!
You're all going to fucking die!
See what you made me do, mother!?
... battling has been fierce. The numbers of casualties are unknown but all indications are that they must be unimaginably large.

If you're just joining us, we're getting some of the first bits of good news, if you can call it that, since this apocalypse began just twenty-four ago. A human militia has formed on the outskirts of Las Vegas and has begun to engage the enemy. Also down in the Four Corners area, we've been receiving unconfirmed reports of another resistance force gathering in Red Rock National in the northern Mojave Desert area.
... And as we fight this new enemy, may God give us the strength to survive and show mercy for those of us who are already lost...
Hey! Get back in your car!      It's a trap!
I'm sorry!     I didn't mean to!
C'mon, don't be scared. I just wanna play with your baby.
Pity about your wings. They would have helped you now.
You think you can defy Him and not pay the price?
Yours is a fool's sacrifice. You can help them sneak out the back door, but they won't escape.
You always wanted to live like one of them...Now you'll know how it feels to die like one of them.
So brave. So pointless. You should have worried more about saving yourself.
"And as the child's cries are extinguished, an eternal darkness at last descended upon the world."
